sections.heading: officer; retirement; records; transfer
sections.text: It shall be the duty of every person retiring from a town office to deliver to his successor in office all the records, books, papers, money, and property belonging to such office held by him.SourceLaws 1895, c. 28, ยง 43, p. 143;R.S.1913, ยง 1029;C.S.1922, ยง 931
